title: Last Stone Weight
content: We have a collection of stones, each stone has a positive integer weight. Each turn, we choose the two heaviest stones and smash them together. Suppose the stones have weights and with . The result of this smash is: If , both stones are totally destroyed; If , the stone of weight is totally destroyed, and the stone of weight has new weight . At the end, there is at most 1 stone left. Return the weight of this stone (or 0 if there are no stones left.)
